title: Ukraine-Russia War and Putin News: Live Updates - The New York Times
content:
1. Ukraine-Russia War and Putin News: Live Updates  The New York Times
  2. Russia threatens to up Kyiv strikes over cross-border attacks  Al Jazeera English
  3. Kyiv Rocked by Explosions as Russia Steps Up Attacks  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Ukraine war far from over as Russia renews strikes in Kyiv  The Associated Press - en Espa√±ol
  5. Surveillance Video Shows Suspected Russian Missile Strikes On Kyiv  NBC News
description: For the second time in recent days, Russia struck a military target in Kyiv, part of a campaign to degrade the Ukrainian military before an expected offensive to seize territory in the east. Russia stepped up its shelling before a battle that analysts say could be long and bloody.
